name: DeepVirus
description:
Game made during Ludum Dare 48, COMPO Mode, my first Game Jam.
Theme is "Deeper and deeper".
LudumDare game page

Introduction

In DeepVirus, you control a Mouse, your goal is to progress “deeper and deeper” into the computer to find the source of a virus. You will have to find files to examine while avoiding the virus.

The Twist!

The game has a kind of unique mechanic using windows that I won’t spoil you! It supports 1080p and 1440p monitors. If you have a bigger resolution, I would recommend lowering it, though I understand the trouble.

There are 1 tutorial and 9 levels in total, introducing some new mechanics here and there.

How to play

Everything is explained in a tutorial at the beginning. You will be using the SPACE and ARROW keys.

Final Notes

I did everything by myself (hence the graphics) using GameMaker Studio 1.4. I used https://sfxr.me/ for the sound effects.
